title: prysm stuck in processing slot 6076224 after geth crash and restart

# ðŸ’Ž Issue

### Background

before error occurs, I kill geth with -9 argsï¼ŒI suspect it's a crash. what shoud I do so that I can resync immediately rather than from the scratch

=== system info ===
Geth version: 1.11.4-stable
CL client & version: prysm@v3.2.2
OS & Version: Linux

### Description
my prysm process stuck in the process slot 6076224, and the logs prompts me that  "could not validate new payload: received an INVALID payload from execution engine", however, geth logs out that "Post-merge network, but no beacon client seen. Please launch one to follow the chain! "
